website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Jet 2019 is a decent basketball shoe for hoopers who want to feel fast on the court. These basketball shoes have plenty of court feel and are very responsive. Bigger players and even older hoopers who require more cushioning may want to think twice before copping a pair.Overall, these Under Armour basketball shoes offer good value for the money. However, it may be a good idea to try these on first to see if it has enough cushioning for your liking.
pros: The 2019 Under Armour Jet has plenty of court feel, many players comment
These basketball shoes have killer traction, most reviewers exclaim
They claim that it works even on dusty courts
Several owners note that the Under Armour Jet 2019 has the same tooling as the UA M-Tag
They just love how fast and responsive these basketball shoes feel
These UA sneakers are quite durable, some wearers observe
There are no noticeable signs of wear, even after months of use
According to one tester, the support and lockdown are sufficient
Many buyers love the style of these basketball sneakers
cons: Like the Curry 6, most users gripe that these Under Armour basketball shoes do not have any impact protection
There are not a lot of user reviews for this product

customer_reviews.title: Great B-Ball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually play basketball on Sunday Nights at an open gym, we are usually running full court 4 v 4 or 5 v 5. Previously I was using Nike shoes the PG3’s, my feet would always hurt running up and down in them to where I would have a sigh of relief after taking them off. I wear Under Armour for lifting weights and thought Nike was more basketball oriented but boy was I wrong, I gave these a go tonight and they are great. They fit just right and are lightweight the shoes don’t feel so tight and have good traction. From now on I’m sticking with Under Armour for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Batman’s Other Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great style and fit, even for a woman
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my tween daughter as it’s hard to find women’s basketball shoes. She has a more narrow foot and these fit great. Style is nice and neutral. She is happy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Size 10.5 Men’s -Overall good shoe/value
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for outside court basketball. Good, but not great bottom foot shock absorption. Fits overall good, but added solid indoor. Great wide foot fit. For the money a good shoe. I would likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kentjax

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my daughter for basketball. She loves them! They are comfortable for running and provide the necessary ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: shantia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have flat feet & they are very comfortable, stylish & worth it....I bought a 2nd pair In another color.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Landers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 16 year old. He absolutely loves them and says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Nichole A Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with out any questions, I love it and I’m satisfied with my shopping
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes and good price at the same time! So, can’t complain👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Emiller

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 yo for basketball. He loves them and how they support his ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin S

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: high quality like under armor do Very light shoe i very like that you don't file the shoes whan you waer it in now price i will probably buy another one
customer_reviews.author: yaniv

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I'm ever going to find a more comfortable shoe than these.
customer_reviews.author: Charles John

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and look!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenager who’s foot grows at rapid speed. The fit was great along with the look and price point.
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them! I’ll be ordering him another pair in the near future just to have a spare pair

customer_reviews.title: Great "do it all" type of sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good sneaker for the price. I wear them to work sometimes but mainly workout in them.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a great feel and are pretty comfortable: they're a tiny tiny bit tight around the midsole, but that should go away with use (I've only played in them once so far).
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a low cost!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great ankle support, good grip on the court!
customer_reviews.author: Kodi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Working out. My husband just had ankle surgery and he needed a comfortable hight top shoe
customer_reviews.author: Lory Rennicke

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered quickly and as listed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find my product, pricing was good and delivered on time
customer_reviews.author: Alan R Eliasof

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and they fit great. Good ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great for Severs Disease for my son!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday in time for my sons practice so he could wear them and break them in before his games this week. For excellent and he says they are very comfortable. UA shoes is all he can wear as he has Severs Disease and they are the only shoe that has enough cushion in them and fit right to his foot so no need to buy all the expensive shoe inserts!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy F.

customer_reviews.title: the cushion really thin
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look good, and hold the ankle well, but the cushion really thin and not as seen from the outside, I played with them once and really felt the floor every time I landed, unfortunately because I used them once I cannot return it so it is quite a waste Money, I back to my good old Nike
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: According to the price is fine..
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is fine for the price...if feels OK and looks so.. I bought it for basketball playing and I have no complaints.. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 11.5 or 12. I got the 12 and am glad I did. They fit great but I would say if you’re in between sizes get the larger size. The shoe is slightly narrow (or at least fits my slightly narrow foot just right). I’m excited to use these for weekend pickup basketball games.
customer_reviews.author: gate

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these probably 15 times for pick up basketball and just shooting hoops and they have held up great! For the price I could not ask for more. They show slight ware on the toe as one would expect from a gym floor, but I am very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Poss

customer_reviews.title: Completely Agree With The Top Reviewer - Too Thin, Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: There is something SERIOUSLY wrong with the design of these shoes. I ran in them for 10 minutes and my left lateral (outer) arch felt like an iron nail was being hammered into it! Extremely poor ergonomic design. Not nearly enough cushion. Extremely unhappy with purchase. Thank Goodness for Amazon's Return Policy!
customer_reviews.author: MadMacs

customer_reviews.title: Better than any Nike basketball shoes under 75
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it embrace my feet. Also it is as light as Reebok Shaq 1. 2 Because of how it fits, one should order a 1/2 inch larger than one's usual size.
customer_reviews.author: NEIL C

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I found that if tied normally, the shoes tongue cuts into my right foot right above my ankle bone, but if loosened, it feels okay. Also these shoes aren't in the least bit waterproof, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: XenoFreak

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: They run small in size and are thin soled. Had to returned for larger size. Fine for walking trials but not so much if you want to run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes do fit tight, I recommend going a half size up. I wear men's 10 but got a 10.5 as I read this in other reviews. Shoe fits well, would have been a really tight uncomfortable fit with a size 10. Colors pop, shoes are light weight with good grip!!
customer_reviews.author: Waver G.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fix issue
customer_reviews.text: I have had a problem with basketball shoes on my right foot. After 30 mins my right pinky toe is in pain. This shoe was no different. Otherwise good. It may be specific to me.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M Suchocki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to play basketball. Fit is good and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kelynda

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size larger. Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Get a 1/2 size bigger than normal. I always purchase a half size bigger however, thistime I had to return for a full size larger. Great shoes non the less!
customer_reviews.author: Destanysangel

customer_reviews.title: Great great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very pleased! Love them. Getting ready to order more in different colors!!!

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandson for Christmas so I’m unable to Answer the questions above until after Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bates

customer_reviews.title: Love it. so lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was really comfortable and lightweight. It is much lighter than I thought it would be, which is a plus. I haven’t tried this shoes in an indoor court but will soon. I’ll probably update my review when I see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tsomoo

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and light. the material seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: altayr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. My son plays high school basketball and he is happy with shoes. Color is perfect as it matches his school colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Having shoes to support and comfort the bottom of my feet
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing them to work andto walk but they didn't comfort or support the bottoms of my feet so everytime I stood to walk ,feet would hurt.
customer_reviews.author: victor coates

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Probably should have got a bigger size.but it’s a great sneaker and protects my feet while playing basketball

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable with plenty of Court grip and support for hard balling!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Compeau

customer_reviews.title: love this one
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and colors. It looks great, feels great, though might not be super breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Adhocmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 13 year old daughter who has a very wide foot. She is a club volleyball player and says they are the most comfortable shoes she’s worn. They don’t rub her foot nor are they too tight on her foot. Definitely recommend for wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sills

customer_reviews.title: Good basketball sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for basketball. He loves them. The tread is good for anti-slip when playing and he says that they are comfortable. Size up a half size as Under Armour sneakers run small.
customer_reviews.author: JSKochFarm

customer_reviews.title: Have a very nice look to it but, falls short on performance
customer_reviews.text: This shoe does not have any ankle support and no arch support. The soles are thin and will wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: When you know the best
customer_reviews.text: Under armour awesome product...you always get more than what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Abendschein

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable basketball shoe option
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice basketball shoe for someone not wanting to shell out $150 for a pair of shoes. Bought these for my 9YO. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: JAPalmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are as good as any basketball shoes I've had. Decent traction, good stability, light weight, but don't expect much cushion. I don't like too much but if you do like squishy insoles these aren't for you.
customer_reviews.author: jcpeterson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product was ordered for child to use while playing school basketball. My child’s exact words were, “These shoes fit like a glove!” My child loves the color, fit, and style.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Bought it for basketball practice and I’m content with the item

customer_reviews.title: Color is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice best looking shoe so comfortable and goes with everything

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for playing on a regulation basketball court. They work great. Good grip and ankle support and they look nice as well. Fit true to size. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 11 y o baller loves them and he has heel issues and these don't exacerbate them. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe looks great and feels great Size 11. Got black , white and the grey blue color All were perfect 💯.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: My 8th grade basketball player loves em. He has a wider foot and other brands are too tight.

customer_reviews.title: Too big, cheap, and thin!
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, seem cheaply made, run way bigger than other UA shoes my husband owns. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Wore half dozen times playing full court basketball and stitching started to unravel.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Under armour is one of few brands that has my size(12.5 men’s). So they are always a go to for footwear. Exceptional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Stubbs-Salazar

customer_reviews.title: The size
customer_reviews.text: I like but there aren’t mint there are for my grandchildren I send it to El Salvador
customer_reviews.author: Olga Romero

customer_reviews.title: Tight at first then softens up
customer_reviews.text: At first tight but once you get them used they fit very well comfy and feels good while you play
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Olivarez

customer_reviews.title: the size bigger than wrote ' but very quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: the size bigger than wrote ' but very quality shoes
customer_reviews.author: Denis Rabaev

customer_reviews.title: Love the under armour shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair, very durable material and great fit. Price point is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Aishah Aslam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing, plus they arrived next day at 7am!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Under
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great and comfortable. I use them for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Leenheer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my boy and they are just as cool as in the picture. Under Armour has consistently been a good brand for clothing but never before had we tried any of their shoes that weren't cleats. I'm glad we did! He says they're very comfortable for both running and just everyday wearing. Not to mention all the compliments. Very nice! 1 star - Awful! Want my money back! 2 stars - Bad but not horrendous. 3 stars - Decent/Good 4 stars - Really good! 5 stars - Excellent! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dustbunny

customer_reviews.title: Good For BBall Practices
customer_reviews.text: My teenager wears a size 10 shoe so I ordered these and they have been worn to multiple basketball practices and a few games. As reported to me, they have a good rubbery sole that provides good traction on the court and they are very lightweight. Lightweight is a positive but they are thin on the sidewalls and do not give as much support to lateral movements as the Nike shoes we bought. I think they are pretty good for basketball practices but, for the games, I would recommend a stronger shoe made of thicker material.
customer_reviews.author: MWCraft

customer_reviews.title: They're super nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 fits me a bit tight. And that's exactly what happened with these shoes, so I would say that they fit as one might expect. They are quite light. That probably indicates that they are not going to last for many years oh, but the price is extremely reasonable. I hope the photos are helpful at giving an idea of how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Tapon

customer_reviews.title: Son approves of UA Basketball/Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son wears these shoes casually and to play basketball. He reports that they are light weight and comfortable. He would like the shoe laces to be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V

customer_reviews.title: A great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: These basketball shoes look really sleek and cool and the fit is true to size. They have a molded midsole that helps the foot land and turn easily on the court to help prevent ankle roll. These are well-made and the construction is fantastic. The leather part is perforated for breathability and the fabric part is a thick mesh material that is also good for movement. They fit great and work well on the basketball court.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: I like this shoe, can wait to play basketball with them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 12 1/2 and it fit perfect, I remove the insoles from the shoes to put on my Orthotics inserts and it felt awesome, if I would of left the original insole and put my Orthotics one's on top, it felt way to tight. I recommend to go up half an inch if you want to use the original insole with your own inserts for more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: One year review:
customer_reviews.text: One year review: Bought them for work, very comfortable. Started as my nice shoes then slowly turned into my “I don’t care” shoes. I’ve put a lot of miles and weight on these shoes. About 3 months in I had to replace the insoles with dr. Scholl’s (had to do this with all my shoes, any brand). Other than that the glue has held up, shoe laces hold strong, and the rubber all around is intact. I’ve had under armour shoes before that were junk but I’m gonna get another pair. Only reason for new pair is my current ones stink. Cant get rid of the smell. My fault for not washing them.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat odd looking shoes feel good the feet
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to describe the appearance of these shoes, but they certainly are different. The ankle support is good, but the cushioning is a little thin compared to heavier sneakers. They fit correctly and lace up to a very snug fit which is good to keep them from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Horner

customer_reviews.title: very nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, well designed shoe. fits as expected. has good ankle support for sharp pivots. i recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side Up

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Appealing to the Eye
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and very comfortable! Perfect basketball shoe without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable while working
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit as expected, look great and are great for my work when I am on my feet all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kerchenski

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoes very much because of its quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Valenzuela

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Jet 2019 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Molded & perforated leather & textile upper for breathability & support. Durable TPU overlay is abrasion resistant & helps maintain shape. Internal heel counter for locked-in support & fit. Internal bootie construction for a secure, comfortable fit. Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support. Compression molded EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride. Internal midfoot shank provides added support to help prevent the foot from rolling over. Rubber outsole with unique traction pattern for lateral movements & maximum grip. Weight: 11 oz.
feature_bullets: Molded & perforated leather & textile upper for breathability & support
Durable TPU overlay is abrasion resistant & helps maintain shape
Material Composition: UPPER: 67% Leather,18% Synthetic,15% Textile~OUTSOLE: 100% R
Internal heel counter for locked-in support & fit
Internal bootie construction for a secure, comfortable fit
Die-cut EVA sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support
